def.name: bOPV birth dose (a zero dose) was not administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: bOPV birth dose (a zero dose) was not administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Dose 0" AND "Birth dose" = TRUE) = 0

operand.name: Number of Polio Dose 0 Doses Administered

def.name: bOPV birth dose (a zero dose) was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: bOPV birth dose (a zero dose) was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Dose 0" AND "Birth dose" = TRUE) = 1

operand.name: Number of Polio Dose 0 Doses Administered

def.name: The latest bOPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: input

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines" and "Type of poliovirus dose" = "bOPV") < 4 weeks

def.name: Client's age was more than 6 weeks when the primary series was started

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age was more than 6 weeks when the primary series was started

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines" AND "Dose number" = 1) "Date of birth" > 6 weeks

a:t.name: note
a:t.value: Dose number doesn't seem correct for this in case birth dose was given so using the series to determine primary series.

a:s.a:s: "Date of First Primary Series Polio Dose"

operand.name: Date of First Primary Series Polio Dose

def.name: Client's age was 6 weeks when the primary series was started

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age was 6 weeks when the primary series was started

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines" AND "Dose number" = 1) "Date of birth" = 6 weeks

a:s.a:s: "Date of First Primary Series Polio Dose"

operand.name: Date of First Primary Series Polio Dose
